perturbation.original_text: During the term of this Agreement and for a period [*] after any expiration or termination of this Agreement, each of INTERSECT and HOVIONE shall maintain in full force and effect a comprehensive general liability insurance policy, including Products Liability coverage, with minimum limits of [*] for bodily injury including death.
perturbation.changed_text: During the term of this Agreement, INTERSECT and HOVIONE shall maintain general liability insurance.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of the requirement to maintain a 'comprehensive' general liability insurance policy, specifically including 'Products Liability coverage' and setting 'minimum limits' weakens the protection for potential third-party claims. California law (where Intersect ENT, Inc. is located) requires businesses to maintain adequate insurance to cover potential liabilities. Removing the minimum limits and specific coverage types introduces legal risk by potentially failing to meet the 'adequate' coverage standard, especially considering the product is a combination drug and device.
perturbation.contradicted_law: California law regarding adequate general liability insurance for businesses, particularly those dealing with pharmaceutical products.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement is to be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York, United States, notwithstanding any conflict of law provisions to the contrary. The United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods shall not apply to this Agreement. Any action which in any way involves the rights, duties and obligations of either party hereto under this Agreement shall be brought in the courts of Geneva and the Parties to this Agreement hereby submit to the personal jurisdiction of any such court. The Parties waive any and all rights to have any dispute, claim or controversy arising out of or relating to this Agreement tried before a jury.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement is to be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York, United States, notwithstanding any conflict of law provisions to the contrary. The United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods shall not apply to this Agreement. Any action which in any way involves the rights, duties and obligations of either party hereto under this Agreement shall be brought in the courts of Geneva and the Parties to this Agreement hereby submit to the personal jurisdiction of any such court.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the jury trial waiver introduces a legal risk. While parties can agree to bench trials, the right to a jury trial is a fundamental right. Omitting the waiver means that either party can later insist on a jury trial, potentially increasing the cost and complexity of litigation. This right is upheld unless explicitly waived and omitting this clause will likely mean this will be adjudicated by a jury.

perturbation.changed_text:
HOVIONE represents and warrants to INTERSECT that:
(a) It has full right and power to enter into this Agreement and perform its obligations hereunder in accordance with its terms;
(b) The API and all components and ingredients thereof shall be manufactured and delivered in strict compliance with the Product Specifications
(c) the plant(s) for manufacture of the API is and shall be in compliance with all applicable cGMPs.
perturbation.explanation: Omitting the statements guaranteeing compliance with applicable regulatory requirements and maintaining the plant's availability for inspection by regulatory authorities removes critical assurances related to product quality and safety.  This introduces a significant legal risk, as it could lead to the production and sale of APIs that do not meet regulatory standards, thus violating the Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act enforced by the FDA.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act
